text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me Bob.
Join me for learning street with Bob
……and they happily lived ever after.
. C’mon kids, it’s time to sleep
But we are not sleepy Bob. We want another story.
But you have heard all these stories a million times.
How about a song Bob? You sing so well.
Oh well, here is a Song of Opposites I just learnt today. Are you ready?
Yay!
SMALL is a mouse You can find in the house BIG is an elephant Sitting in a circus tent.

BIG and SMALL together
Are opposites of each other.

FAST is a hare Hopping without a care
SLOW is a turtle
Walking in a circle.FAST and SLOW together are Opposites of each other.

OPEN is this box With Johnny’s old socks.
We better shut it CLOSE
Before the smell gets to our nose.OPEN and CLOSE together are opposites of each other.
See how chubby and FAT Is that big tomcat But THIN is the kitten
Drinking milk in the kitchen FAT and THIN together are opposites of each other.
Drink a FULL jug of water when it gets hotter Refill the jar when EMPTY
For there is plenty.FULL and EMPTY together are opposites of each other.
If you do everything RIGHT You are good and bright. If you do something WRONG
Say sorry and you aren’t bad long. RIGHT and WRONG together Are opposites of each other.
How HEAVY is this tableTo lift it, I’m unable Now what here would be LIGHT?
I think that yellow kite.HEAVY and LIGHT together Are opposites of each other

Jill is a YOUNG girl Who loves to twirl.
Her grandma is an OLD lady
Whose name is Sadie.YOUNG and OLD together are opposites of each other.
Here’s the FRONT of a shirt With no speck of dirt. And this is the BACK
A little grimy and black. FRONT and BACK together Are opposites of each other

How NOISY we have been We’ve created quite a din. Now, be QUIET and sleep
Let me not hear another beep.

NOISY and QUIET together
Are opposites of each other.
Goodnight kids.
